snippet.title: Out of Line Trailer
snippet.description:
Out of Line follows the adventures of San in a quest to escape the Factory, that was once home. Set in a mysterious world, in a hand painted art style, progress through an immersive story that will be revealed through multiples chapters and unique puzzles.


Wishlist on Steam : https://bit.ly/32KsK7g


Twitter : https://twitter.com/Nerd_Monkeys
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nerdmonkeys
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NerdMonkeys
